mapper.select: SELECT sa.*, sv.id vid, sv.`sale_attr_value_name` FROM spu_sale_attr sa LEFT JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.`spu_id` = sv.`spu_id` and sa.base_sale_attr_id = sv.base_sale_attr_id WHERE sa.spu_id = #{spuId} order by sa.id,sv.id

SELECT sa.*, sv.id vid, sv.`sale_attr_value_name`, IF(kv.sale_attr_value_id IS NULL,'0','1') AS is_checked FROM spu_sale_attr sa LEFT JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.`spu_id` = sv.`spu_id` and sa.base_sale_attr_id = sv.base_sale_attr_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value kv ON sv.id = kv.sale_attr_value_id and kv.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE sa.spu_id = #{spuId} order by sa.id,sv.id
